text: Abraham molyvsya: "Miy Lord, roblyatʹ tse myrolyubna zemlya, ta zabezpechuyutʹ yoho lyudey z fruktamy. Zabezpechte dlya tsykh khto virte v BOHU ta ostannʹomu Dnyu." (Boh) skazav, "ya takozh zabezpechu dlya tsykh khto disbelieve. YA dozvolyu yim polyublyayu, tymchasovo, todi zdiysnyuyu yikh do retribution Pekla, ta neshchasnoyi doli
